title: Fix blank home screen by implementing IndexPage content

requirements.text: Replace the empty IndexPage placeholder content with a functional home screen that displays a welcome message and indicates the app is ready for use

quotes: Tela de início está em branco

acceptanceCriteria: The IndexPage component renders visible content instead of a blank screen
Users see a clear welcome message or starter content when visiting the root route
The page layout is properly structured within the existing Layout component

requirements.text: Update the application title in frontend/index.html from 'New Application' to a meaningful placeholder or generic app name
acceptanceCriteria: The browser tab displays a proper application title instead of 'New Application'
The title is generic enough to work for any new application being built

requirements.text: Verify that the App.tsx router configuration correctly mounts IndexPage at the root route and that Layout wrapper is properly applied
acceptanceCriteria: The root route ('/') successfully renders the IndexPage component
The Layout component header and footer are visible on the home screen
No console errors appear related to routing or component mounting

constraints: Preserve the existing Layout component structure with header and footer
Maintain the minimal starter template approach without introducing application-specific features
Do not modify immutable infrastructure files (useInternetIdentity, useActor, main.tsx)
nonGoals: Adding complex application logic or data models
Creating multiple pages or navigation beyond the single home screen
